doc.title: Zento Makan Session
doc.text: Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP turned/VBD up/RP for/IN the/DT Zento/JJ Makan/NN Session/NN !/. Thanks/DT also/RB to/TO Taukwa/VB who/WP helped/VBZ with/IN the/DT organization/NN and/CC to/TO Dyana/VB and/CC Chef/NN Wibisono/NN for/IN hosting/NN us/PRP !/. As/IN you/PRP can/MD see/VB from/IN the/DT photos/NNS ,/, our/JJ participants/NN all/RB had/VBD quite/RB a/DT few/JJ novel/JJ and/CC unique/JJ dishes/NNS to/TO try/VB ./. I/PRP think/VB for/IN most/NN people/NN ,/, the/DT soy/NN wrap/NN was/VBD quite/RB new/JJ and/CC the/DT Wagyu/NN Roll/NN was/VBD a/DT favorite/NN amongst/NN our/JJ kakis/NNS ./. For/IN those/RB who/WP did/VBD not/RB manage/JJ to/TO make/VB it/PRP our/JJ makan/NN session/NN ,/, no/DT worries/NN ./. Dyana/PRP has/VBZ specially/RB arranged/JJ for/IN an/DT ieat/JJ Degustation/NNP Menu/NNP for/IN $/$ 48/CD per/NN head/NN -LRB-/NN min/NN 4/CD pax/NN -RRB-/NN ./. So/RB now/RB you/PRP can/MD make/VB your/PRP$ own/JJ arrangments/NN to/TO come/VB at/IN a/DT more/JJ convenient/JJ time/NN to/TO taste/VB the/DT food/NN ./. Please/JJ ring/NN up/IN first/JJ and/CC make/VB reservations/NN ./. There/EX are/VBP currently/RB several/JJ promos/NN at/IN Zento/NN ./. Monday/JJ nights/NNS are/VBP Free/NNP Flow/NNP Draft/NNP Beer/NNP nights/NN and/CC Tuesday/NN nights/NNS are/VBP Ladies/JJ night/NN ./. There/EX are/VBP also/RB Family/JJ Specials/NN on/IN weekends/NN ./. For/IN details/NNS do/VB check/VB out/IN their/PRP$ website/NN at/IN www.zento.com.sg/NN ./.
